benchmark_details.name: FlowBench
benchmark_details.overview: FlowBench is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating workflow generation systems, including a variety of task types and node complexities, aimed at testing the capabilities of workflow generation models such as ComfyGPT.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a robust evaluation framework for workflow generation methods in AI systems.

data.source: ComfyUI community websites through web crawling.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by evaluating the performance of generated workflows against specified criteria, such as execution success and instruction alignment.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating accurate and diverse workflows.
methodology.validation: The model's performance is validated against predefined metrics established in the FlowBench dataset.
